story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Introducing Prose: A Content Editor for GitHub | Development Seed
caption: developmentseed.org
description: Since the relaunch of developmentseed.org on Jekyll last fall, we have built many Jekyll sites hosted with the excellent GitHub Pages. This approach gives us great peace of mind. Generated static sites have fewer moving pieces and are cheaper to maintain, and retain great flexibility for building. G...
